attributes.action: stop spending taxpayer pounds, money garnisheed from the british public, on schools in Africa and elsewhere on the planet where Gordon Brown needs to impress, until after all the problems in the huge numbers of failing schools in this country (including the school now being used to educate the children of Mr Brown's Education Secretary) are put right.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What more do you need to be told?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
